## Plane.distanceToPoint() method

Calculate the distance from a point to the plane.

**Signature:**

```typescript
distanceToPoint(p: Vector3): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The point |

**Returns:**

number

The distance value.
